Thunderstorm: Thanks, but I can handle myself. Chopper mode!

He transforms into a helicopter and follows Mustex and Stallex.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Mustex: Until we find a team to join up with sure we could use all 
the 
> help we can get until we can find some allies. Common' you can ride 
my 
> cycle.
>

>

private

one
